title: Spartacus: Vengeance Season 2 2013 DVDR R4 NTSC
description:
In continuation of blood escape from the House of Batiatus that concluded " Spartacus : Blood and Sand " , the gladiator rebellion continues and begins to strike fear into the heart of the Roman Republic in " Spartacus : Vengeance ." Gaius Claudius Glaber and his Roman troops are sent to Capua to crush the growing band of freed slaves that Spartacus leads before it can cause further damage. Spartacus is presented the choice of satisfying his personal need for vengeance against the man that condemned his wife to slavery and eventual death or making the larger sacrifices to keep his army together.
